item.title: Venezuela's interim leader sacks general in charge of Maduro's guard
item.description: General Javier Marcano Tábata was the commander of the inner circle of guards tasked with protecting Maduro.

item.title: Big freeze causes travel chaos across western Europe
item.description: More than 700 flights were cancelled at Amsterdam's Schiphol Airport alone on Wednesday.

item.title: Rare mountain gorilla twins born in Africa's oldest national park
item.description: Trackers in DR Congo's Virunga National Park spotted the babies being hugged by their mother on Saturday.

item.title: Nigeria's ex-justice minister granted bail in $6m corruption case
item.description: Abubakar Malami was one of the most influential figures in the administration of former President Buhari.

item.title: 'Fear in the streets': Venezuelans uncertain about what might happen next
item.description: The BBC spoke to Venezuelans after the seizure by US forces of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro.
